channel.title: Make my Server accesable
channel.description:
Hey guys, I just made a new delta based server.
My friend tryed to access it through another client, the way he always acessed my old one.
Is there a way to make it so he can access(or anyone else can) though any client?
Help would be appcieated thanks :)
-Will

item.title: Make my Server accesable
item.dc:creator: @aquikzebra aquikzebra
item.description:
@aquikzebra wrote:

Um, im pretty sure, u can still go on, the items and animations with show up as nulls.

I just want it to let them log in, nulls or not doesnt matter.

-Will

Read full topic

item.title: Make my Server accesable
item.dc:creator: @Cancel Cancel
item.description:
@Cancel wrote:

uhhhh, thats not always possible unless your a straight server with no alternate customs or custom animations, your old source might not have had some animations that the new one has so the old client cant access them.

Read full topic

item.title: Make my Server accesable
item.dc:creator: @aquikzebra aquikzebra
item.description:
@aquikzebra wrote:

Lmao Ik that, but some servers arent accesiable through other clients, i want mine to be accesable through other clients

-Will

Read full topic

item.title: Make my Server accesable
item.dc:creator: @Imaginary Imaginary
item.description:
@Imaginary wrote:

Depending on the Client Revision: <eg 317,525 etc>
Make sure the source and the client are both the same Revision.
Then open the Client Folder > Client Files > Open Gui.Java
Then press CTRL + F and in the Search Box type in “ip” and the first one that comes out something like
Serverip = “127.0.0.1”; should come out or whatever ip you had there before and then change the “127.0.0.1” to whichever ip you’re using; for example change “127.0.0.1” to “tutoria.no-ip.biz” always make sure to put " " (quotations)
then compile and that’s all!
Have fun.

Read full topic
